s: I fell in love with Bishop Briggs' album Church of Scars. I really love the feel of that album and it doesn't contain any songs I don't like. But it's not available on vinyl and this one is. That said, I like this album okay and the record itself has great sound quality. I just don't love the songs as much as Church of Scars. I'd recommend sampling the tracks before buying the vinyl. ...
